title: How to find and kill a process running on a port in macOS
snippet: To find a process on a macOS El Capitan (10.15) and newer run the below command in Terminallsof -i tcp:&lt;port_number&gt;eg: lsof -i tcp:5253The lsof command will list all the process running on that port with their PIDs.COMMAND PID USER FD TYPE DEVICE SIZE/OFF NODE ...
